verses.verse: Now it happened, <S%H8085><s%> when it was reported to Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> and Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> and to Geshem <S%H1654><s%> the Arabian, <S%H6163><s%> and to the rest <S%H3499><s%> of our enemies, <S%H341><s%> that I had built <S%H1129><s%> the wall, <S%H2346><s%> and that there was no breach <S%H6556><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> therein; <S%H1571><s%> (though even to that time <S%H6256><s%> I had not set up <S%H5975><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> in the gates; <S%H8179><s%>)

that Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> and Geshem <S%H1654><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> to me, <S%H559><s%> saying, "Come, <S%H3212><s%> let us meet <S%H3259><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> in the villages <S%H3715><s%> in the plain <S%H1237><s%> of Ono. <S%H207><s%>" But they intended <S%H2803><s%> to <S%H6213><s%> harm me. <S%H7451><s%>

I sent <S%H7971><s%> messengers <S%H4397><s%> to them, <S%H559><s%> saying, "I am doing <S%H6213><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> work, <S%H4399><s%> so that I can't <S%H3201><s%> come down. <S%H3381><s%> Why should the work <S%H4399><s%> cease, <S%H7673><s%> while <S%H834><s%> I leave <S%H7503><s%> it, <S%H3381><s%> and come down to you?"
They sent <S%H7971><s%> to me four <S%H702><s%> times <S%H6471><s%> after this sort; <S%H1697><s%> and I answered <S%H7725><s%> them the same way. <S%H1697><s%>

Then Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> his servant <S%H5288><s%> to me the same way <S%H1697><s%> the fifth <S%H2549><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> with an open <S%H6605><s%> letter <S%H107><s%> in his hand, <S%H3027><s%>

in which was written, <S%H3789><s%> "It is reported <S%H8085><s%> among the nations, <S%H1471><s%> and Gashmu <S%H1654><s%> says <S%H559><s%> it, <S%H3064><s%> that you and the Jews intend <S%H2803><s%> to rebel. <S%H4775><s%> Because of that, <S%H1933><s%> you are building <S%H1129><s%> the wall. <S%H2346><s%> You would be <S%H1933><s%> their king, <S%H4428><s%> according to these words. <S%H1697><s%>

You have also appointed <S%H5975><s%> prophets <S%H5030><s%> to preach <S%H7121><s%> of you at Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> <S%H4428><s%> 'There is a king in Judah! <S%H3063><s%>' Now it will be reported <S%H8085><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> according to these words. <S%H1697><s%> Come <S%H3212><s%> now therefore, <S%H3289><s%> and let us take counsel together. <S%H3162><s%>"

Then I sent <S%H7971><s%> to him, <S%H559><s%> saying, "There are <S%H1961><s%> no such things <S%H1697><s%> done <S%H1961><s%> as you say, <S%H559><s%> but you imagine <S%H908><s%> them out of your own heart. <S%H3820><s%>"

For they all would have made us afraid, <S%H3372><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> "Their hands <S%H3027><s%> will be weakened <S%H7503><s%> from the work, <S%H4399><s%> that it not be done. <S%H6213><s%> But now, <S%H2388><s%> strengthen my hands. <S%H3027><s%>"

I went <S%H935><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> of Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah <S%H1806><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Mehetabel, <S%H4105><s%> who was shut in <S%H6113><s%> at his home; <S%H559><s%> and he said, "Let us meet together <S%H3259><s%> in the house <S%H1004><s%> of God, <S%H430><s%> within <S%H8432><s%> the temple, <S%H1964><s%> and let us shut <S%H5462><s%> the doors <S%H1817><s%> of the temple; <S%H1964><s%> for they will come <S%H935><s%> to kill <S%H2026><s%> you; <S%H3915><s%> yes, in the night will they come <S%H935><s%> to kill you. <S%H2026><s%>"

I said, <S%H559><s%> "Should such <S%H3644><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> as I flee? <S%H1272><s%> Who is there that, <S%H935><s%> being such as I, would go into the temple <S%H1964><s%> to save his life? <S%H2425><s%> I will not go in. <S%H935><s%>"

I discerned, <S%H5234><s%> and behold, <S%H430><s%> God had not sent <S%H7971><s%> him; <S%H1696><s%> but he pronounced this prophecy <S%H5016><s%> against me. <S%H2900><s%> Tobiah and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> had hired him. <S%H7936><s%>

He hired <S%H7936><s%> so that I would be afraid, <S%H3372><s%> do so, <S%H6213><s%> and sin, <S%H2398><s%> and that they might have material for an evil <S%H7451><s%> report, <S%H8034><s%> that they might reproach me. <S%H2778><s%>

"Remember, <S%H2142><s%> my God, <S%H430><s%> Tobiah <S%H2900><s%> and Sanballat <S%H5571><s%> according to these their works, <S%H4639><s%> and also the prophetess <S%H5031><s%> Noadiah, <S%H5129><s%> and the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the prophets, <S%H5030><s%> that would have put me in fear. <S%H3372><s%>"
So the wall <S%H2346><s%> was finished <S%H7999><s%> in the twenty <S%H6242><s%> - fifth <S%H2568><s%> day of Elul, <S%H435><s%> in fifty <S%H2572><s%> - two <S%H8147><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

It happened, <S%H341><s%> when all our enemies heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, <S%H1471><s%> that all the nations that were about us <S%H5439><s%> were afraid, <S%H5439><s%> and were much <S%H3966><s%> cast down <S%H5307><s%> in their own eyes; <S%H5869><s%> for they perceived <S%H3045><s%> that this work <S%H4399><s%> was worked <S%H4399><s%> of our God. <S%H430><s%>

Moreover in those days <S%H3117><s%> the nobles <S%H2715><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> sent <S%H1980><s%> many <S%H7235><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> to Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> and Tobiah <S%H2900><s%>'s letters came to them. <S%H935><s%>

For there were many <S%H7227><s%> in Judah <S%H3063><s%> sworn <S%H1167><s%> to him, <S%H2860><s%> because he was the son-in-law of Shecaniah <S%H7935><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Arah; <S%H733><s%> and his son <S%H1121><s%> Jehohanan <S%H3076><s%> had taken <S%H3947><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah as wife. <S%H1296><s%>

Also they spoke <S%H559><s%> of his good deeds <S%H2896><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me, <S%H3318><s%> and reported my words <S%H1697><s%> to him. <S%H2900><s%> Tobiah sent <S%H7971><s%> letters <S%H107><s%> to put me in fear. <S%H3372><s%>
